abstract: deal : irobot roomba 877 robotic vacuum cleaner for $ 349 - 1/24/18 .
article: amazon has the irobot roomba 877 available for just $ 349 . that is a pretty insane deal , considering this model is typically around $ 729 , that 's more than half off . and it 's priced similar to the regular price of irobot 's mid-range and entry-level roomba robot vacuums . making this a great time to pick one up . the roomba 877 has aeroforce cleaning , which means it 'll be able to clean your home without leaving anything behind . like some of the other robotic vacuum cleaners out there tend to do .

additionally , it has enough battery inside to clean your home on one go-round . this one does not work with amazon alexa or google assistant , yet , but that should be coming in the near future . the roomba 877 is a great way to get your home nice and clean while you sit back and relax during the day . ces 2018 complete wrap up - everything you need to know ! all the news and more ! click here to read about all the latest announcements ! this item is also eligible for amazon prime 's free shipping .

which includes free two-day shipping , and pretty cheap next-day shipping if you need it here extra fast . if you are not an amazon prime member yet , you can sign up for a free trial of amazon prime by hitting the link below . you 'll get 30 days free , and then it 's $ 99/year . prime members do get a whole lot more than just free shipping though , so be sure to check out the full benefits . irobot roomba 877 robotic vacuum cleaner .
